SEARCH
Package business

Class Class

java.lang.Object
business.Class
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public class Class extends Object implements Component
Represents a Class in a business application. The Class can have attributes, methods, a position, and a state. It implements various methods defined by the Component interface.

This class is configured to ignore unknown JSON properties during deserialization.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Class

      public Class(String name, int noOfPartitions, boolean drawPartition, Point position)
      Constructs a Class with the specified name, number of partitions, drawPartition flag, and position.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Class
      noOfPartitions - the number of partitions in the Class
      drawPartition - flag indicating whether to draw partitions
      position - the position of the Class

    • Class

      public Class()
      Constructs a default Class with the name "Class", no attributes or methods, no partitions, and a default position.
